Descrição: An application for carrying out a questionnaire campaign in all Schools. The data collected from these questionnaires will make it possible to assess the level of contagion risk of each participant, by School.

Imagens.Descrição: Program main menu
Program area where it is possible to consult the registered schools
Program area where it is possible to consult the registered questionnaires

Descrição: The objective of this project is to implement a music search website and create a playlist using a public API to search for songs

Imagens.Descrição: Home page where you can search for songs and singers, among others
Search using the Last.fm API where you can search for songs and singers
Top 10 of the most listened to songs in 5 countries
It is possible to play selected songs via youtube API

Descrição: A store that sells toys, and promotes events aimed at children, wants an application to manage information related to its customers, schools, entertainers and events it organizes.

Imagens.Descrição: Main menu of the program where it is possible to access several submenus
Submenu where it is possible to manage the animators (CRUD)
Submenu where it is possible to manage customers and their children (CRUD)
Submenu where it is possible to perform school management (CRUD)
Submenu where it is possible to manage events (CRUD) and confirm participation in a given event, by schools, animators and children of registered customers
Subwindow where schools, children of customers registered in the application and animators can be registered in a given event
Submenu where it is possible to manage the products (CRUD) and the type of products
Submenu where it is possible to perform sales management (CRUD)
Subwindow where it is possible to register a sale
Invoice example of a registered purchase

Descrição: The objective of this project was the development of a chat with secure exchange of messages and files in C#. The application consists of a client module and a server module.

Imagens.Descrição: Sign up in the application database
Registered account login
Login of a second account, where it will be announced in the others accounts chat already logged in, and also on the server
Sending a message to general chat, where it was presented to all participants in the conversation
When a logout is performed, it is announced by the server, the exit of that user from the general chat
